pr_title: [KOGITO-858] Add a Decision Table RuleUnit example

timeline.bodyText: it's probably better for now to remove these tests against the programmatic APIs, as 1) they duplicate the http tests 2) they test an API that is still not stable nor public 3) they pose some problems when we use the quarkus extension instead of the maven plugin (basically they break the build because unfortunately the extension runs after the tests, in the package phase...)
timeline.author: evacchi

replies.bodyText: So that is the reason why we use kogito-maven-plugin also with Quarkus examples instead of Kogito Quarkus extension?
replies.author: MarianMacik

replies.bodyText:
no, that's a side effect.
the reason why we use the maven plugin is it was too hard to use the latest codegen (SNAPSHOT) because the quarkus bom controlled versioning of the extension (and therefore of the runtimes). If we wanted to use the extension, we would have to redeclare all dependencies explicitly in all poms. Now that we can control it, we can provide our own "kogito-quarkus-bom" pointing to SNAPSHOT
replies.author: evacchi

timeline.bodyText: let's remove it from here too, to avoid confusion
timeline.author: evacchi
